data.text:
February 1, 1964: The Old Armory, Franklin, VA

March 6-12, 1964: Royal Theater, Baltimore, MD

March 13-19, 1964: Howard Theatre, Washington, DC (with the Miracles, the Temptations, Dionne Warwick, King Curtis, Carolyn Crawford & (MC) Bill Murray)

March 23, 1964: Magnolia Ballroom, Atlanta, GA

March 28, 1964: Muncie Armory, Muncie, IN

April 12, 1964: Civic Center, Baltimore, MD (supporting James Brown & The Famous Flames, with Solomon Burke, Garnet Mimms, Dionne Warwick, The Tams, The Orlons, Anna King, Dean & Jean, Timmy Shaw, Bobby Byrd, Johnny & Bill, Paul Williams & (MC) King Coleman)

April 22, 1964: Fairgrounds Speedways, Nashville, TN (supporting James Brown & The Famous Flames, with Solomon Burke, Garnet Mimms, Dionne Warwick, The Tams, The Orlons, Anna King, Dean & Jean, Timmy Shaw, Bobby Byrd, Johnny & Bill, Paul Williams & (MC) King Coleman)

April 24, 1964: Stambaugh Auditorium, Youngstown, OH (supporting Moms Mabley)

April 25, 1964: Cobo Arena, Detroit, MI (supporting James Brown & The Famous Flames, with Solomon Burke, Garnet Mimms, Dionne Warwick, The Tams, The Orlons, Anna King, Dean & Jean, Timmy Shaw, Bobby Byrd, Johnny & Bill, The Reflections & Gino Washington)

July 7, 1964: Paterson Field, Montgomery, AL (supporting Solomon Burke, with Rufus Thomas, Garnet Mimms, The Enchanteers, Joe Tex, The Tams, Sugar Pie Desanto, Fats Barnes & Roy Hines)

July 31-August 3, 1964: Carib Theatre, Kingston, JAM (supporting Millie Small, with Inez & Charlie Foxx & Patti Labelle and the Bluebells)

October 10-11, 1964: Island Club, Miami, FL

October 30, 1964: Regal Theatre, Chicago, IL (with the Miracles, the Four Tops, Patti Labelle and the Bluebells, Bobby Freeman & Flip Wilson)

December 10, 1964: National Guard Armory, Jackson, TN (2 shows 7.00 & 11.00, supporting Jerry Butler & Betty Everett, with Don Covay, Billy Butler and the Chanters & Jimmy Reed)

December 14, 1964: Municipal Auditorium, Nashville, TN (supporting Jerry Butler & Betty Everett, with Don Covay and Goodtimers, Billy Butler and the Chanters, Major Lance, Jimmy Reed & (MC) Noble Blackwell)

December 20-21, 1964: Stanton Theatre, Baltimore, MD (3 shows 5.00, 8.00 & 11.00, supporting Jerry Butler & Betty Everett)

December 25, 1964:-January 3, 1965: Howard Theatre, Washington DC

February 6-7, 1965: Island Club, Miami, FL (2 shows on 7th)

February 19-25, 1965: Apollo Theatre, New York City, NY o Supporting The Miracles & Etta James, with Johnny Taylor, Bobby McClure & Fontella Bass)

February 27, 1965: Rafael’s Night Club, Latham, NY

April 9-11, 1965: Club Jamaica, Columbus, OH

June 25, 1965: Richmond Arena, Richmond, VA (Summer Parade Of Stars)
